description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国家安全部北美情报司司长、外事局主任，于1985年叛逃至美国。
description.en: Former Director of the North American Intelligence Bureau and Director of the Foreign Affairs Bureau of the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China, who defected to the United States in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任第一机械工业部部长。他是俞强声和俞正声的父亲，曾与江青同居并是其入党介绍人。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as the Minister of the First Ministry of Machine Building. He was the father of Yu Qiangsheng and Yu Zhengsheng, cohabited with Jiang Qing, and was her sponsor for joining the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市副市长。她是俞强声和俞正声的母亲。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as the Vice Mayor of Beijing. She was the mother of Yu Qiangsheng and Yu Zhengsheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。他是俞强声的弟弟。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC. He is the younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的一所大学，俞强声的母校。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Yu Qiangsheng.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家安全部
en: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责国家安全工作的组成部门，俞强声曾在此担任北美情报司司长、外事局主任。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for state security. Yu Qiangsheng served here as Director of the North American Intelligence Bureau and Director of the Foreign Affairs Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的国家，俞强声于1985年叛逃至此。
description.en: A country in North America to which Yu Qiangsheng defected in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 潜伏于美国中央情报局40多年的中华人民共和国情报人员，因俞强声提供的情报而被捕。
description.en: An intelligence officer of the People's Republic of China who had been embedded in the US Central Intelligence Agency for over 40 years and was arrested based on intelligence provided by Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 美国主要的情报机构之一。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 一名前法国外交官，曾为中华人民共和国政府提供情报，其事迹被俞强声揭露。
description.en: A former French diplomat who provided intelligence to the government of the People's Republic of China, and whose activities were exposed by Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民政府下设主管北京市公安工作的职能部门，俞强声曾在1960年代中期在此任职。
description.en: The functional department under the Beijing Municipal People's Government in charge of public security work in Beijing. Yu Qiangsheng worked here in the mid-1960s.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间的一场政治运动，俞强声在此期间曾担任处理张郎郎案的专案组组长。
description.en: A political campaign during the Cultural Revolution, during which Yu Qiangsheng served as the head of a special case group handling the case of Zhang Langlang.

description.zh-cn: 在一打三反运动期间，被俞强声负责的专案组指控为“叛国投敌”的法国间谍。
description.en: Accused of being a French spy for "betraying the country and defecting to the enemy" by a special case group led by Yu Qiangsheng during the One Strike-Three Anti Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 前美国联邦调查局中国反情报组组长，曾在1990年见过俞强声。
description.en: Former head of the FBI's China counterintelligence unit, who met Yu Qiangsheng in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 美国国内的情报与安全机构。
description.en: The domestic intelligence and security service of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声的祖父，曾任中华民国交通部陇海铁路局局长。
description.en: Paternal grandfather of Yu Qiangsheng, served as the Director of the Longhai Railway Bureau of the Ministry of Transport of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声的曾祖父，晚清进士。
description.en: Paternal great-grandfather of Yu Qiangsheng, a Jinshi in the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声的高祖父。
description.en: Paternal great-great-grandfather of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，毛泽东的第四任妻子。曾与俞启威同居。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, the fourth wife of Mao Zedong. She once cohabited with Yu Qiwei.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家，俞强声的二弟。
description.en: An economist and the second younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声的大妹，文化大革命期间自杀。
description.en: The elder younger sister of Yu Qiangsheng, who committed suicide during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远影响。俞慧声在此期间自杀。
description.en: A major political movement that took place in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976, having a profound impact on Chinese society. Yu Huisheng committed suicide during this period.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声的小妹，曾与微软公司发生商业冲突。
description.en: The youngest sister of Yu Qiangsheng, who had a business conflict with Microsoft Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国科技公司。
description.en: An American multinational technology corporation.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家、外交家，曾为微软股东，并就俞慈声相关事宜向北京市委书记施压。
description.en: An American politician and diplomat, formerly a Microsoft shareholder, who pressured the Beijing Municipal Party Secretary regarding matters related to Yu Cisheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，联想集团创始人，被描述为倪光南的“死对头”。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Lenovo Group, described as the 'nemesis' of Ni Guangnan.

description.zh-cn: 中国计算机科学家，曾声援俞慈声，并与柳传志有分歧。
description.en: A Chinese computer scientist who supported Yu Cisheng and had disagreements with Liu Chuanzhi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。倪光南曾就俞慈声事件上书于他。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as Premier of the State Council. Ni Guangnan submitted a letter to him regarding the Yu Cisheng incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任国防部部长。他是俞强声的堂叔祖父。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Minister of National Defense. He was the paternal granduncle of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞大维之父，俞明震之弟。
description.en: Father of Yu Dawei and younger brother of Yu Mingzhen.

description.zh-cn: 俞大维之子，蒋经国女婿。
description.en: Son of Yu Dawei and son-in-law of Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国之女，俞扬和之妻。
description.en: Daughter of Chiang Ching-kuo and wife of Yu Yanghe.

description.zh-cn: 俞扬和与蒋孝章之子，蒋中正的曾外孙。
description.en: Son of Yu Yanghe and Jiang Xiaozhang, great-grandson of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A statesman and military leader of the Republic of China who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，蒋中正之子，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, son of Chiang Kai-shek, who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 俞启威是俞强声的父亲。
description.en: Yu Qiwei is the father of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 范瑾是俞强声的母亲。
description.en: Fan Jin is the mother of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞正声是俞强声的弟弟。
description.en: Yu Zhengsheng is the younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞敏声是俞强声的弟弟。
description.en: Yu Minsheng is the younger brother of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞慧声是俞强声的妹妹。
description.en: Yu Huisheng is the younger sister of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞慈声是俞强声的妹妹。
description.en: Yu Cisheng is the younger sister of Yu Qiangsheng.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声毕业于北京国际关系学院。
description.en: Yu Qiangsheng graduated from the Institute of International Relations in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 1960年代中期，俞强声进入北京市公安局一处（政治保卫处）任便衣警察。
description.en: In the mid-1960s, Yu Qiangsheng joined the First Division (Political Security Division) of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau as a plainclothes policeman.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家安全部

position.zh-cn: 北美情报司司长、外事局主任
position.en: Director of North American Intelligence Bureau, Director of Foreign Affairs Bureau

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，俞强声在中华人民共和国国家安全部任北美情报司司长、外事局主任。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening Up, Yu Qiangsheng served as the Director of the North American Intelligence Bureau and Director of the Foreign Affairs Bureau at the Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声于1985年叛逃美国，并向美国提供情报，出卖了中国在美潜伏的情报人员。
description.en: Yu Qiangsheng defected to the United States in 1985 and provided intelligence to the U.S., betraying Chinese intelligence personnel undercover in the U.S.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声叛逃后为美国提供情报。
description.en: After his defection, Yu Qiangsheng provided intelligence to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声向美国提供情报，导致潜伏中央情报局40多年的中华人民共和国情报人员金无怠于1985年被捕。
description.en: Yu Qiangsheng provided intelligence to the United States, which led to the arrest of Jin Wu-dai, an intelligence officer of the People's Republic of China who had been undercover in the CIA for over 40 years, in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声揭露了伯纳德·布尔西科为中华人民共和国政府提供法国政府情报一事。
description.en: Yu Qiangsheng exposed Bernard Boursicot's activities of providing French government intelligence to the government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在一打三反运动期间，俞强声担任了处理张郎郎案的专案组组长。
description.en: During the One Strike-Three Anti Campaign, Yu Qiangsheng served as the head of the special case group handling the Zhang Langlang case.

description.zh-cn: 俞强声曾任“一打三反”时某专案组组长，该专案组负责张郎郎“叛国投敌”案。
description.en: Yu Qiangsheng served as the head of a special case group during the 'One Strike-Three Anti Campaign', which was responsible for the 'treason and defection' case of Zhang Langlang.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国联邦调查局中国反情报组组长I·C·史密斯曾于1990年见过俞强声。
description.en: I. C. Smith, then head of the FBI's China counterintelligence unit, met with Yu Qiangsheng in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 俞启威和范瑾是夫妻关系。
description.en: Yu Qiwei and Fan Jin were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 俞大纯是俞启威的父亲。
description.en: Yu Dachun is the father of Yu Qiwei.

description.zh-cn: 俞明震是俞大纯的父亲。
description.en: Yu Mingzhen is the father of Yu Dachun.

description.zh-cn: 俞文葆是俞明震的父亲。
description.en: Yu Wenbao is the father of Yu Mingzhen.

description.zh-cn: 俞文葆是俞明颐的父亲。
description.en: Yu Wenbao is the father of Yu Mingyi.

description.zh-cn: 俞明震和俞明颐是兄弟关系。
description.en: Yu Mingzhen and Yu Mingyi were brothers.

description.zh-cn: 俞明颐是俞大维的父亲。
description.en: Yu Mingyi is the father of Yu Dawei.

description.zh-cn: 俞大维是俞扬和的父亲。
description.en: Yu Dawei is the father of Yu Yanghe.

description.zh-cn: 俞扬和与蒋孝章是夫妻关系。
description.en: Yu Yanghe and Jiang Xiaozhang were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 俞扬和是俞祖声的父亲。
description.en: Yu Yanghe is the father of Yu Zusheng.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝章是俞祖声的母亲。
description.en: Jiang Xiaozhang is the mother of Yu Zusheng.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国是蒋孝章的父亲。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo is the father of Jiang Xiaozhang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正是蒋经国的父亲。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek is the father of Chiang Ching-kuo.

description.zh-cn: 俞启威曾与江青同居。
description.en: Yu Qiwei once cohabited with Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 俞启威是江青的入党介绍人。
description.en: Yu Qiwei was Jiang Qing's sponsor for joining the Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 俞慧声在文化大革命期间自杀。
description.en: Yu Huisheng committed suicide during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 俞慈声曾将微软踢出中国市场。
description.en: Yu Cisheng once kicked Microsoft out of the Chinese market.

description.zh-cn: 微软股东基辛格给时任北京市市委书记写信施压，以应对俞慈声的行动。
description.en: Microsoft shareholder Henry Kissinger wrote a letter to the then Beijing Municipal Party Secretary to exert pressure in response to Yu Cisheng's actions.

description.zh-cn: 倪光南与多名学者上书朱镕基声援俞慈声。
description.en: Ni Guangnan, along with several other scholars, submitted a letter to Zhu Rongji in support of Yu Cisheng.

description.zh-cn: 文本描述倪光南为柳传志的“死对头”。
description.en: The text describes Ni Guangnan as the 'nemesis' of Liu Chuanzhi.

description.zh-cn: 倪光南与多名学者上书朱镕基声援俞慈声。
description.en: Ni Guangnan, along with several other scholars, submitted a letter to Zhu Rongji to support Yu Cisheng.
